title: 'Poor quality'
body: 'Never buy Asics shoes.....  "I had a terrible experience with Asics shoes. After just a few days of use the rubber grip on the outsole came off indicating poor product quality. Unfortunately Asics was unwilling to replace the product."'

title: 'Damaged
body: '1.0 out of 5 stars''The media could not be loaded. Astonished and Suprised. If the retailer did not have the product should not have hosted it.  What sense does it make to provide a defective product and take it back.  Both the shoes have a tear the soul has a tear.  Absolutely disgusting.  Hope the retailer has a product for exchange.  Lets see what comes during exchange. Brand new or used product.  Waiting anxiously.'

title: 'Just about average product!'
body: 'Go for two sizes bigger than your usual choice. I went for one size bigger in search of loose fit but this one feels as tight as a number lesser in Puma. This pair feels comfortable and solid but not as good as the running shoes from Puma. I got them for a nice bargain and hence I am pretty satisfied. But for the usual asking price this feels overpriced.'

title: 'Experience'
body: 'They are very rigid and Hard which is a + point in durability. I also loved the appearance and grip. There was just a slight discomfort while wearing them for frst time but after using them for 3 days straight the discomfort starts to fade away. Great for GYM use.'

title: 'Good for price'
body: 'I bought it in a sale. Got it for very good price. Comfort is also as per price. I have an asics bought from offline store and that has better comfort compared to this one. So I can say comfort is as per price. Durability wise it is very good. And looks decent enough for office wear too. I am happy'
